mdRecord.dcterms:title: 29366 Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mansion at Mount Vernon - from the southeast. Mounted on gray board. The publishers imprint on the front of the card reads: Keystone View Company, Manufacturers and Publishers, Copyrighted made in the U. S. A. Meadville, Pa., New York, N. Y., Chicago, Ill., London, England. The reverse of the card includes information about the estate including geographic coordinates. Number 96 in a series. Copyright by The Keystone View Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
